Articles.Content:
Hi all, could I suggest a new display setting for KSP. A full screen windowed modes. This would be very helpful for people using dual screen

Thank you

The Unity game engine has a borderless mode, you can access this by starting KSP with the -popupwindow command line argument, that line can be added to a shortcut to the KSP.exe

See here for more details on Unity command line args
